  2. Thai prime minister declares £324m in assets including 217 designer handbags  The Guardian
  3. 217 designer handbags, 75 luxury watches: What's more in Thailand PM Paetongtarn Shinawatra's over $400 m  The Times of India
  4. London Properties, Luxury Bags in Thai PM’s $400 Million Assets  Bloomberg
  5. Paetongtarn declares assets worth B13.9bn  Bangkok Post
